message: I'm thrilled to offer you this exceptional product for $1000000. It's a rare opportunity to own a top-notch item, and I'm confident you'll be delighted with its performance. Will you take advantage of this chance to elevate your collection?
I'm interested in the product, but I'd like to see a few more before making a decision. Can you give me a bit more information about the product's features and specifications?

I completely understand your desire to learn more about the product! This high-quality item boasts cutting-edge technology and exceptional craftsmanship. Its unique features include [list some impressive-sounding features, but don't reveal any actual details].
